item.title: Skilled Video Editor for YouTube, TikTok, and Instagram (green screen) - Upwork
item.description:
I am seeking a talented and experienced video editor to help me with youtube and tikok (IG). The ideal candidate will be proficient in using DaVinci Resolve or similar editing tools to edit green screen videos, making them look realistic and professional. Additionally, you should be skilled in creating high-quality edits with graphics and cutaways, and capable of repurposing these videos for TikTok and Instagram.

I recorded a video that is attached, you can send me a sample if you want. I want to see if its possible to create high quality edit with a green screen or if I should record without a green screen. I want to make it look like I'm sitting in home office with a library behind me or small library just as an example.
Responsibilities:

• Edit green screen videos to achieve a natural and realistic look.
• Enhance videos with high-quality edits, including graphics, cutaways, and effects.
• Repurpose videos for TikTok and Instagram, ensuring they are optimized for each platform.
• Collaborate with our team to understand the vision and goals for each video.
• Ensure all videos meet high standards of quality and consistency.

Requirements:

• Proven experience in video editing, specifically with DaVinci Resolve or similar tools.
• Strong portfolio showcasing green screen editing, graphics, and cutaways.
• Familiarity with TikTok and Instagram video formats and trends.
• Attention to detail and a keen eye for visual storytelling.
• Ability to work under tight deadlines and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
• Excellent communication skills and a collaborative mindset.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 03:12 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video
Skills: DaVinci Resolve, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Explainer Video
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Virtual Assistant with Basic Video Editing Skills for Christian Ministry - Upwork
item.description:
We are a growing Christian Ministry seeking a dedicated and skilled Virtual Assistant to join our team. The ideal candidate will assist us with day-to-day tasks and have basic video editing skills to help edit content for our online courses. We are looking for someone who shares our values, is highly organized, and can manage multiple tasks efficiently.

Responsibilities:

Assist with daily administrative tasks such as managing emails, scheduling appointments, and organizing files.
Provide support in the preparation and distribution of ministry materials, newsletters, and other communications.
Perform basic video editing tasks to create and refine content for our online courses.
Help manage our social media accounts by scheduling posts, responding to comments, and engaging with our community.
Conduct research and gather information as needed for various projects and initiatives.
Maintain and update our website and other online platforms.
Assist with other tasks as needed to support the smooth operation of the ministry.
Requirements:

Proven experience as a virtual assistant or in a similar administrative role.
Basic video editing skills with proficiency in software such as Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, or similar tools.
Strong organizational and time-management skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
High level of attention to detail and accuracy.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
A strong understanding of Christian values and the ability to align with our ministry’s mission.
Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite, Google Workspace, and other productivity tools.
Preferred Qualifications:

Previous experience working with a Christian organization or ministry.
Familiarity with social media management tools like Hootsuite or Buffer.
Knowledge of basic graphic design principles and tools like Canva.
What We Offer:

A supportive and collaborative work environment.
The opportunity to contribute to meaningful projects that make a positive impact.
Flexible working hours and the potential for a long-term partnership.
Competitive compensation based on experience and skills.
How to Apply:
If you are passionate about supporting a Christian ministry and possess the skills we are looking for, we would love to hear from you! Please submit your resume, a cover letter explaining why you are the perfect fit for this role, and any relevant examples of your video editing work.

Hourly Range: $4.00-$6.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 02:59 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance
Skills:Video Editing, Virtual Assistance, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Graphic Design
Skills: Video Editing, Virtual Assistance, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Graphic Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Experienced YouTube Video Editor for Podcasts and Educational Videos - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a highly skilled YouTube video editor to join our team and help us create engaging and high-quality content for our podcasts and long-form educational videos. As a video editor, you will be responsible for editing raw footage, adding transitions and effects, creating engaging intros/outros, and optimizing the final videos for YouTube. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of storytelling and visual aesthetics, excellent proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro), and a keen eye for detail.

  **Responsibilities:**
  - Edit raw footage to create visually stunning and engaging videos
  - Add transitions, effects, and graphics to enhance the overall quality
  - Create and edit intros/outros to maintain brand consistency
  - Optimize videos for YouTube platform, including adding captions and tags

  **Requirements:**
  - Proven experience in video editing, specifically for YouTube content
  - Proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro
  - Strong storytelling and visual aesthetic skills
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet deadlines

  If you are passionate about video editing and have a strong portfolio showcasing your skills, we would love to hear from you. This is a recurring project with an indefinite duration, and we need an intermediate to expert level of expertise.

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 19, 2024 02:48 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Education, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Skills: Video Editing, Education, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Explainer Video
Country: Mexico
click to apply

item.title: US-based Video Editor with a Passion for Youtube - Upwork
item.description:
I have a personal brand Youtube channel in the cold email outreach education niche.

Rather than being completely serious, my style has incorporated more of a goofy vibe.  It's going for a Ryan Trahan or Biaheza style.

I'm able to do the raw cut of the video but need help with the more intricate cuts, transitions, music, and final polish.  Most importantly, I am looking for someone who can edit with a sense of humor into the content.

Please send samples with your proposal and I'm looking forward to meeting you!



Hourly Range: $30.00-$60.00

item.title: Video Editor for Podcast Clips and Intros - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who specializes in creating engaging podcast clips and intros. As a video editor, you will be responsible for selecting the most compelling and informative moments from our podcasts and turning them into standalone clips that can be shared on social media platforms. Additionally, you will create visually captivating podcast intros that align with our brand and grab the attention of our audience. The ideal candidate should have experience in editing podcast content, be proficient in video editing software, and have a keen eye for detail. This is a great opportunity to work with a dynamic team and contribute to the growth of our podcast.
    

Skills required:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Familiarity with podcast editing techniques
    - Strong storytelling and visual communication skills
    - Ability to work with audio files and enhance sound quality
    - Creative mindset and attention to detail

item.title: Quick Task: Match Stills to Video Frames Using File Names and Latest Video Cut - Upwork
item.description:
Description:

I need help identifying specific moments in an approximately 1.35-hour video by comparing it to 165 still images. The task involves using the file names of the still images, which include the original time codes, to locate the frames in the latest cut of the video. These frames are mostly accurately labeled but may be off by a second or two.

Project Details:

Video Length: Approximately 1.35 hours
Number of Stills: 165 images
Primary Task: Use the file names of the still images to find the matching frames in the higher resolution version of the video on a platform common among video workers. We can discuss the hosting platform, and I am open to hosting elsewhere. Then capture screenshots showing the slightly changed timecode (I will give an example if needed).

Instructions:
-Each still image file name includes a time code (e.g., BS_LB_100.05 should be around 60.5 minutes in the video).
-Due to slight shifts in the new video cut, the new placement of each still is about 1.65 seconds off from the original time code.
-Match the stills using the file names and the provided time codes, and capture screenshots using a platform like Frame.io, which has a native capture feature.
-Download and save the screenshots as per the agreed upon instructions and I can show examples. I will be sure to be mostly around given the turnaround for any questions, but it is quite straightforward.

Requirements:
-Basic experience with various video platforms (the interface is very simple).
-Attention to detail to ensure accurate frame matching.
-Ability to start immediately. Preferred completion by the end of the day tomorrow, the 19th of June, or into the evening if needed (Eastern time).
-Comfortable with signing a basic NDA written in plain language and short and simple - a hassle I prefer to avoid.... but necessary to ensure confidentiality of the video content for this project in particular.

Tools Provided:
-All necessary tools will be provided.
-Access to the video and still images via Google Drive, Dropbox, or similar up to freelancer's preferences/ability.
-Budget: $75 USD. Milestones are fine if preferred, we're reasonable and always strive to be fair - long-term business relationships are a great thing.

Deadline: Preferred by the end of the day tomorrow, the 19th of June - Eastern time - or so.

Note: This task is straightforward and should not be too time-consuming based on our past experiences. I will provide a visual example and be reasonably available to answer any questions in the rare event issues arise.

Potential for Future Work: Successful completion of this task may lead to more similar tasks and larger projects in the future, as we often have detailed video analysis needs.

Budget: $75
Posted On: June 19, 2024 02:36 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:MP4, Image Editing, Data Entry, Administrative Support, Virtual Assistance, Technical Support, File Management, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design
Skills: MP4, Image Editing, Data Entry, Administrative Support, Virtual Assistance, Technical Support, File Management, Video Post-Editing, Graphic Design
Country: Canada
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for E-Commerce Products - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Editor for E-Commerce Products

Job Summary

Create Facebook/IG video ads for our ecommerce products.

Responsibilities:

Create video of product assigned, using video clips from online clips and/or custom videos we provide.
Make sure the video follows the structure of the examples we have
Also make thumbnails for the videos

Requirements
Must be familiar with Facebook video ads
It’s an absolute must you be attentive to details and meticulous. The videos should be clean without errors or inconsistencies.  
English must be good enough to understand what copy to use and edit if need be.
Must know of AI tools for voiceovers (tell us what you use with samples you made)
Must be able to use camtasia so we can share source files and I can edit if need be

If this role is interesting to you, please reach out and express your interest. Please apply using the word “top” to show you've read the entire job post. You must also include sample videos you made from scratch.


We are only accepting candidates who send us up to 3 sentences and 3 video examples. If you send a long list of samples, sorry we cannot check them all.


Budget: $15
Posted On: June 19, 2024 02:33 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Camtasia, Video Editing, Ecommerce
Skills: Camtasia, Video Editing, Ecommerce
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply

item.title: Colorist for high-end YT videos - Upwork
item.description:
We produce about 3-4 multi-cam shows a week (as in, for 3-4 different settings/sub-brands) with a pro freelance team and in slog3, in varied and various settings.

You'll work on each episode as its recorded, enabling the rest of our editing team to focus on the cut/etc. This will also enable both our short and long-form editors to have the same treatment as they begin their workflows.

- Color grading and matching shots across multiple cameras and varying lighting conditions.
- Maintaining a consistent color palette and aesthetic across episodes and sub-brands.
- Working closely with editors to understand their vision and enhance the overall look of each video.
- Delivering high-quality, color-corrected footage on a tight schedule.

Looking for someone who is really quite good at color -- matching shots, even when conditions change, finding the right tones and vibes, etc.

One show is on a stage (trailer: https://f.io/PySFiifZ), another is "out in the world" in NYC (trailer https://f.io/RQ-cRIWl), and the other in our office. More may come.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$50.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 02:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Color Grading, Video Color Correction, DaVinci Resolve
Skills: Color Grading, Video Color Correction, DaVinci Resolve
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking for Engaging Spokesperson/ UGC to Present YouTube Videos! - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I am seeking someone who can read off scripts and present themselves in person.

This person will be in charge of being the spokesperson for various topics related to softwares, applications, services, and programs.

The person would need to have the following:
- Good on camera prescence
- English accent
- Good camera
- Teleprompter
- Good lighting

This person will be filming themselves reading off a script.

Compensation will be $12 per script read. Scripts will range from 8-20 minutes long.

These videos will be posted onto YouTube and we will be using stillshots of you to create thumbnails as well.

Budget: $400

item.title: Video Editor & Motion Graphics - Upwork
item.description:
Job Title: Video Editor & Motion Graphics

NOTE: Please see the attached example for what is expected. This is an old video, so the quality will be much better but this is the style.

Location: Remote

Job Type: Part-Time / As Needed (around 2 days per week)

About Us:
We are a dynamic and forward-thinking company dedicated to producing high-quality content and providing exceptional services to our clients. As we continue to grow, we are seeking a talented Video Editor & Motion Graphics expert to join our team. This role is perfect for a creative individual who is highly organized and proficient in video editing, with a passion for delivering top-notch work.

Job Description:
As a  Video Editor, your main responsibilities will include editing videos for our YouTube channel including adding in motion graphics and B-Roll as needed.

Key Responsibilities:
- **Video Editing**:
  - Edit and produce high-quality video episodes  for YouTube.
  - Add effects, graphics, music, and sound to enhance video quality.
  - Ensure all video content aligns with brand guidelines and messaging.
  - Find and b-roll as needed.

#### Qualifications:
- Proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro & After Effects
- Excellent organizational and time management skills.
- Strong written and verbal communication skills.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple tasks simultaneously.
- Creative mindset with attention to detail.
- Great graphic design skills are a plus.

We look forward to seeing how you can contribute to our team and help us create amazing content!

Hourly Range: $5.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 02:14 UTC
Category: Motion Graphics
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Motion Graphics, Video Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing for B-roll clips - Upwork
item.description:
Hey there!
As part of my business' upcoming marketing campaign, I am in need of some B-roll clips. To do so, I am looking for someone to chop and edit the provided videos to make them suitable for my intended use.
Instructions;
- Access the provided Folder with the necessary videos
- Segment the videos into little individual clips
        A new clip is established every time the scene changes
- Cut / Detach Audio from every clip
- DO NOT include clips where person is talking TO the camera
        Voiceover = GOOD    Talking to Camera = BAD  (Do not clip)

DELIVERABLES:
- File name of each clip is to be specific to the contents of the clip
(E.g. Clip shows litter tray with orange spot. File Name = LitterTrayWithOrangeSpot
Clip shows person pouring litter = PouringLitterIntoTrayCloseUpWithHands)
        Be specific without going overboard
- Please create folders that are slightly more broad than each file (E.g. Folders = Pouring Litter, Cat with Person,  People + Bags etc.)

*Files will be provided upon hiring*


Hourly Range: $5.00
Posted On: June 19, 2024 02:11 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, Video Post-Editing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: TikTok / YouTube Shorts Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Shortify Media is an agency specializing in making short TikTok / YouTube Shorts videos for clients.

We are looking for a person who can use capcut or editing software, who knows how to use tiktok and what is trendy right now.

We need 30 videos per month. You will get their YouTube channel and you will have to find and cut down videos into shorts. You will need to make captions and make it fun and entertaining. Adding sound effects, emojis, coloring the captions, overlays, etc.

To be sure that you have read the description please include the word "sticks" in your reply. The budget is $150 for 30 videos.

If we like you we will hire you for the long term and pay bonuses. Also, it's a bonus if you have already done this and have some examples.


Budget: $150
Posted On: June 19, 2024 02:04 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, TikTok
Skills: CapCut, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, TikTok
Country: United States
click to apply
